name: Tiki Kart Island
summary: Race, fly, and rocket-jet into the forbidden lands of Tiki Kart Island at ridiculous speeds and discover the mysteries of this ancient world in a deep story-driven campaign adventure! Go to war in a Battle Arena in real-time multiplayer online combat to recover long lost blueprints that unlock hundreds of rare items and powerful upgrades! Win prizes by becoming a Tiki Builder and create your own tracks for people all over the world to race and vote on the best of the best.
